pageContext.claim: “I jokingly said one time, ‘And everybody then gets a Rolls-Royce.’ And the fake news said, ‘President Trump lied. He said that the illegal immigrants all get a Rolls-Royce.’ They don't have a lot of sense of humor. … They don't get a Rolls-Royce. I'm only kidding about the Rolls-Royce.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump at various times complained about receiving Pinocchios or being called a liar by CNN for saying undocumented immigrants would receive Rolls-Royces. Actually, the Pinocchios were for his claim that Democrats wanted to give immigrant driver's licenses. We -- and CNN -- noted that he later said he was joking about the luxury cars.
